quest.name: 「グンヒルドの剣」の復刻
journal:
Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Forename Surname? I am Zlatan. It's an honor to meet you. I've not much experience with the forge, but it is my hope that I might improve working under Master Gerolt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first step in my training appears to be getting him to remember my name...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Yer here. Good. Ready to get workin' on the Resistance weapons, lasslad?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “Fire in the Forge,” you will receive a Resistance weapon for an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another job.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please speak with Gerolt again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Ye like the name, “Resistance weapon”?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: It crossed me mind to call 'em Gunnhildr's blades, but after talkin' with Misija, we figured it'd be too confusin', seein' as that's also the name o' the queen's guard.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Anyroad, yer timin' couldn't be better. Before we get to workin' in earnest, I was hopin' ye could tell me a bit more about what went on in Cid's noggin. I've heard a fair bit from Mikoto, but I'd like to know if you saw any different.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Seems to me those fancy markin's in the weapons are mainly for show. I can copy 'em, aye, but that won't be enough.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rowena...?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: The weapon's nearly finished, Forename. Just needs a nice coatin' with that powder to finish the inscription.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

quest.name: 新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造
journal: Zlatan is gravely concerned by the potential cost of forging additional Resistance weapons.

At the mention of forging additional Resistance weapons, Zlatan's expression turns to one of staggering guilt. Knowing their coffers cannot bear the weight of additional debt, he accedes to your request on the condition that you procure the required powder. How the deed is to be done, he leaves entirely to your discretion.

Through means perhaps better left unspoken, you acquire the requisite powder for Gerolt's work. Newly armed, he bids you set out into the world and hone your skills with this newly fashioned Resistance weapon. And when the time comes, he will help you to reach new heights of martial perfection.
objectives: Obtain Thavnairian scalepowderDeliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Zlatan at Gangos.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Linin' Rowena's pockets again... <sigh>

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Better your coin than the Bozjans' I suppose. If yer sure about this, we'll get to finishin' yer weapon.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. [???]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. I call 'em [Error] and [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: If what we've learned about the blades o' Gunnhildr is true, ye can make 'em stronger dependin' on what manner o' monster you felled with 'em. Should hold true for yers as well.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: So once ye've put 'emher through theirher paces, come back an' I'll see about toughenin' 'emher up.

quest.name: 「グンヒルドの剣」の復刻
journal:
Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Forename Surname? I am Zlatan. It's an honor to meet you. I've not much experience with the forge, but it is my hope that I might improve working under Master Gerolt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first step in my training appears to be getting him to remember my name...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Yer here. Good. Ready to get workin' on the Resistance weapons, lasslad?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “Fire in the Forge,” you will receive a Resistance weapon for an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another job.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please speak with Gerolt again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Ye like the name, “Resistance weapon”?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: It crossed me mind to call 'em Gunnhildr's blades, but after talkin' with Misija, we figured it'd be too confusin', seein' as that's also the name o' the queen's guard.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Anyroad, yer timin' couldn't be better. Before we get to workin' in earnest, I was hopin' ye could tell me a bit more about what went on in Cid's noggin. I've heard a fair bit from Mikoto, but I'd like to know if you saw any different.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Seems to me those fancy markin's in the weapons are mainly for show. I can copy 'em, aye, but that won't be enough.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rowena...?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: The weapon's nearly finished, Forename. Just needs a nice coatin' with that powder to finish the inscription.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, Thavnairian scalepowder can now be purchased from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造

quest.name: 新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造
journal: Zlatan is gravely concerned by the potential cost of forging additional Resistance weapons.

At the mention of forging additional Resistance weapons, Zlatan's expression turns to one of staggering guilt. Knowing their coffers cannot bear the weight of additional debt, he accedes to your request on the condition that you procure the required powder. How the deed is to be done, he leaves entirely to your discretion.

Through means perhaps better left unspoken, you acquire the requisite powder for Gerolt's work. Newly armed, he bids you set out into the world and hone your skills with this newly fashioned Resistance weapon. And when the time comes, he will help you to reach new heights of martial perfection.
objectives: Obtain Thavnairian scalepowderDeliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Zlatan at Gangos.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Hopefully, acquiring the means to barter for additional powder shouldn't be too taxing a task for a worldly adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: You wish to forge another Resistance weapon? Oh dear...

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It will take time, but we should be able to gather the required materials. Save for one... If you would be willing to acquire more powder, we will see to the rest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Thavnairian scalepowder can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I take it you have paid visit to the House of Splendors?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Linin' Rowena's pockets again... <sigh>

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Better your coin than the Bozjans' I suppose. If yer sure about this, we'll get to finishin' yer weapon.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. [???]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. I call 'em [Error] and [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: If what we've learned about the blades o' Gunnhildr is true, ye can make 'em stronger dependin' on what manner o' monster you felled with 'em. Should hold true for yers as well.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: So once ye've put 'emher through theirher paces, come back an' I'll see about toughenin' 'emher up.

quest.name: 「グンヒルドの剣」の復刻
journal:
Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Forename Surname? I am Zlatan. It's an honor to meet you. I've not much experience with the forge, but it is my hope that I might improve working under Master Gerolt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first step in my training appears to be getting him to remember my name...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Yer here. Good. Ready to get workin' on the Resistance weapons, lasslad?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “Fire in the Forge,” you will receive a Resistance weapon for an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another job.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please speak with Gerolt again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Ye like the name, “Resistance weapon”?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: It crossed me mind to call 'em Gunnhildr's blades, but after talkin' with Misija, we figured it'd be too confusin', seein' as that's also the name o' the queen's guard.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Anyroad, yer timin' couldn't be better. Before we get to workin' in earnest, I was hopin' ye could tell me a bit more about what went on in Cid's noggin. I've heard a fair bit from Mikoto, but I'd like to know if you saw any different.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Seems to me those fancy markin's in the weapons are mainly for show. I can copy 'em, aye, but that won't be enough.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rowena...?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA

dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: The weapon's nearly finished, Forename. Just needs a nice coatin' with that powder to finish the inscription.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Zlatan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, Thavnairian scalepowder can now be purchased from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

quest.name: 新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造
journal: Zlatan is gravely concerned by the potential cost of forging additional Resistance weapons.

At the mention of forging additional Resistance weapons, Zlatan's expression turns to one of staggering guilt. Knowing their coffers cannot bear the weight of additional debt, he accedes to your request on the condition that you procure the required powder. How the deed is to be done, he leaves entirely to your discretion.

Through means perhaps better left unspoken, you acquire the requisite powder for Gerolt's work. Newly armed, he bids you set out into the world and hone your skills with this newly fashioned Resistance weapon. And when the time comes, he will help you to reach new heights of martial perfection.
objectives: Obtain Thavnairian scalepowderDeliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Zlatan at Gangos.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Linin' Rowena's pockets again... <sigh>

dialogue.text: Better your coin than the Bozjans' I suppose. If yer sure about this, we'll get to finishin' yer weapon.

dialogue.name: GEROLT

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. I call 'em [Error] and [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: If what we've learned about the blades o' Gunnhildr is true, ye can make 'em stronger dependin' on what manner o' monster you felled with 'em. Should hold true for yers as well.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: So once ye've put 'emher through theirher paces, come back an' I'll see about toughenin' 'emher up.

quest.name: 「グンヒルドの剣」の復刻
journal:
Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first step in my training appears to be getting him to remember my name...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Yer here. Good. Ready to get workin' on the Resistance weapons, lasslad?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.text: Anyroad, yer timin' couldn't be better. Before we get to workin' in earnest, I was hopin' ye could tell me a bit more about what went on in Cid's noggin. I've heard a fair bit from Mikoto, but I'd like to know if you saw any different.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Seems to me those fancy markin's in the weapons are mainly for show. I can copy 'em, aye, but that won't be enough.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rowena...?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: The weapon's nearly finished, Forename. Just needs a nice coatin' with that powder to finish the inscription.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A repeatable quest is now available from Zlatan at Gangos. This quest may be accepted to create Resistance weapons for other jobs.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Zlatan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, Thavnairian scalepowder can now be purchased from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

quest.name: 新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造
journal: Zlatan is gravely concerned by the potential cost of forging additional Resistance weapons.

At the mention of forging additional Resistance weapons, Zlatan's expression turns to one of staggering guilt. Knowing their coffers cannot bear the weight of additional debt, he accedes to your request on the condition that you procure the required powder. How the deed is to be done, he leaves entirely to your discretion.

Through means perhaps better left unspoken, you acquire the requisite powder for Gerolt's work. Newly armed, he bids you set out into the world and hone your skills with this newly fashioned Resistance weapon. And when the time comes, he will help you to reach new heights of martial perfection.
objectives: Obtain Thavnairian scalepowderDeliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Zlatan at Gangos.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Hopefully, acquiring the means to barter for additional powder shouldn't be too taxing a task for a worldly adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: You wish to forge another Resistance weapon? Oh dear...

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: ZLATAN

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Excellent. I will have Master Gerolt set to work at once.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Linin' Rowena's pockets again... <sigh>

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Better your coin than the Bozjans' I suppose. If yer sure about this, we'll get to finishin' yer weapon.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. [???]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. I call 'em [Error] and [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: If what we've learned about the blades o' Gunnhildr is true, ye can make 'em stronger dependin' on what manner o' monster you felled with 'em. Should hold true for yers as well.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: So once ye've put 'emher through theirher paces, come back an' I'll see about toughenin' 'emher up.

quest.name: 「グンヒルドの剣」の復刻
journal:
Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Forename Surname? I am Zlatan. It's an honor to meet you. I've not much experience with the forge, but it is my hope that I might improve working under Master Gerolt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first step in my training appears to be getting him to remember my name...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Yer here. Good. Ready to get workin' on the Resistance weapons, lasslad?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “Fire in the Forge,” you will receive a Resistance weapon for an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another job.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please speak with Gerolt again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Ye like the name, “Resistance weapon”?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: It crossed me mind to call 'em Gunnhildr's blades, but after talkin' with Misija, we figured it'd be too confusin', seein' as that's also the name o' the queen's guard.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Anyroad, yer timin' couldn't be better. Before we get to workin' in earnest, I was hopin' ye could tell me a bit more about what went on in Cid's noggin. I've heard a fair bit from Mikoto, but I'd like to know if you saw any different.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Seems to me those fancy markin's in the weapons are mainly for show. I can copy 'em, aye, but that won't be enough.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rowena...?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: The weapon's nearly finished, Forename. Just needs a nice coatin' with that powder to finish the inscription.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A repeatable quest is now available from Zlatan at Gangos. This quest may be accepted to create Resistance weapons for other jobs.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Zlatan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, Thavnairian scalepowder can now be purchased from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造

quest.name: 新たな「レジスタンス・ウェポン」の製造
journal: Zlatan is gravely concerned by the potential cost of forging additional Resistance weapons.

At the mention of forging additional Resistance weapons, Zlatan's expression turns to one of staggering guilt. Knowing their coffers cannot bear the weight of additional debt, he accedes to your request on the condition that you procure the required powder. How the deed is to be done, he leaves entirely to your discretion.

Through means perhaps better left unspoken, you acquire the requisite powder for Gerolt's work. Newly armed, he bids you set out into the world and hone your skills with this newly fashioned Resistance weapon. And when the time comes, he will help you to reach new heights of martial perfection.
objectives: Obtain Thavnairian scalepowderDeliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Zlatan at Gangos.

dialogue.text: Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Zlatan.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another job.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.text: Please speak with Zlatan again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have already received [Error] and [Error]. Please change to a different job and speak with Zlatan again.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have already received [Error]. Please change to a different job and speak with Zlatan again.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: You wish to forge another Resistance weapon? We do have a surplus of materials from the first, but there still remains the matter of the powder.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When we first resolved to undertake the forging of these weapons, we understood it would come at considerable cost. But it is no exaggeration to say that a single weapon has greatly taxed our coffers.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It shames me to ask this after you have done so much for our cause, but... Might we prevail upon you to procure the powder on our behalf?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Hopefully, acquiring the means to barter for additional powder shouldn't be too taxing a task for a worldly adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: You wish to forge another Resistance weapon? Oh dear...

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It will take time, but we should be able to gather the required materials. Save for one... If you would be willing to acquire more powder, we will see to the rest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Thavnairian scalepowder can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: My apologies for placing such a burden on you, but we simply cannot afford to accrue further debt from Mistress Rowena.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Thavnairian scalepowder can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I take it you have paid visit to the House of Splendors?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Excellent. I will have Master Gerolt set to work at once.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Linin' Rowena's pockets again... <sigh>

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Better your coin than the Bozjans' I suppose. If yer sure about this, we'll get to finishin' yer weapon.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. [???]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Some o' me best work, if I do say so meself. I call 'em [Error] and [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: If what we've learned about the blades o' Gunnhildr is true, ye can make 'em stronger dependin' on what manner o' monster you felled with 'em. Should hold true for yers as well.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: So once ye've put 'emher through theirher paces, come back an' I'll see about toughenin' 'emher up.

quest.name: 「グンヒルドの剣」の復刻
journal:
Gerolt looks ready to fire up his forge.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Thanks to your efforts and Cid's cooperation, everything is in place to begin reforging the blades of Gunnhildr, arms Gerolt would now refer to as Resistance weapons. Before setting to work, however, Gerolt asks you to expound on your exploration of Cid's mind. This insight makes clear to him that the weapons require a final ingredient before they can be completed─a special powder highly conductive to aether. Much to his dismay, the one best suited to acquiring this for you is none other than Rowena. At the risk of incurring more debt, he asks you to meet with her in Kugane to make an arrangement on behalf of the Bozjan Resistance.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Rowena has heard the details of your predicament from Gerolt, and is willing to provide you with the powder you require. It will, however, come at a cost to the Bozjan Resistance. You are unsure of what this means for Bajsaljen and his comrades, but the deal is struck nevertheless. With matters settled in Kugane, you return to Gangos, eager to see the fruits of Gerolt's labor.

Though you are too late to behold the masterful strikes of Gerolt's hammer on his anvil, you are fortunate enough to witness the final touches to the inscription. Armed as one of Gunnhildr's elite guard, you will soon be ready to help liberate the people of Bozja.
objectives: Wait for Rowena at the Umineko Teahouse in Kugane.
Deliver the Thavnairian scalepowder to Gerolt at Gangos.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Forename Surname? I am Zlatan. It's an honor to meet you. I've not much experience with the forge, but it is my hope that I might improve working under Master Gerolt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first step in my training appears to be getting him to remember my name...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Yer here. Good. Ready to get workin' on the Resistance weapons, lasslad?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “Fire in the Forge,” you will receive a Resistance weapon for an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another job.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please speak with Gerolt again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Ye like the name, “Resistance weapon”?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: It crossed me mind to call 'em Gunnhildr's blades, but after talkin' with Misija, we figured it'd be too confusin', seein' as that's also the name o' the queen's guard.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Anyroad, yer timin' couldn't be better. Before we get to workin' in earnest, I was hopin' ye could tell me a bit more about what went on in Cid's noggin. I've heard a fair bit from Mikoto, but I'd like to know if you saw any different.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Sounds like I was right to ask ye before settin' to work.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Seems to me those fancy markin's in the weapons are mainly for show. I can copy 'em, aye, but that won't be enough.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Like as not they were carved into the hilts as well. And to make sure the spell can take hold, ye'd need a finish with fine powder what's conductive to aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: For material like that, I reckon ye'd need to consult the alchemists o' Radz–at–Han... <sigh> And I can only think o' one person with close contacts there.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rowena...?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Oh gods, you don't mean...?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, the demoness o' coin.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But not to worry, lasslad. It just so happens she's been keepin' up a steady shipment o' supplies here on contract. If we say we need the powder fer the Resistance, might be as we can convince her to waive the costs.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: She ain't usually one to do business fer charity, I know, but it's worth a try, eh? I'll see about getting in touch with her, and after I do, you can go and meet with her an' figure out the rest.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well ye don't expect me to go and meet with her, do ye? Workin' on the Resistance weapons's kept me too busy by half, and Drake here─ Er, I mean... Uh... What was yer name again?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Zlatan, Master Gerolt. My name is Zlatan. But more importantly, what if Mistress Rowena doesn't agree to a charitable contribution to our cause?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'm sure if you an' Bajsaljen ask her nicely she might come 'round. But never mind that─we've important work to do.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: As fer where to find Rowena, afore she left Gangos, she said she'd be stoppin' over in Kugane on business. How's about I have her meet ye at the Umineko Teahouse? If we're lucky, a nice cup o' tea'll brighten her mood.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Afraid I'll have to leave Rowena to you, lasslad. Me tryin' to bargain with her'd be like squeezin' blood from a stone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I fear Bajsaljen will not take well to Master Gerolt's plan. But I suppose it is for the sake of the Resistance...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I was wonderin' when you'd show up. Gerolt told me everything.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: And luckily for you, my business here was at the Thavnairian Consulate. Here you are. This should be enough powder for one of those Resistance weapons you're forgin'.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've got to hand it to Gerolt. Seems he spends half his time getting deeper in debt, and the other half avoiding payment.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Fine by me, though. Thanks to his schemin' I've a little more leverage over the Resistance and, by extension, him as well.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Pass along a message to Gerolt and Bajsaljen for me, won't you? If they require more material for these weapons, I'd be more than happy to supply them. For a fee, of course.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Same goes for you. I know you adventurin' types are always lookin' to be prepared for any sort of encounter, so if you're thinkin' of forgin' another of these Resistance weapons─and I suspect you are─you know where to go.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'll see to it my girls in Revenant's Toll and Idyllshire keep their shelves stocked. Until next time.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: It has long been our wish to see the blades of Gunnhildr reforged, and it is for that purpose Bajsaljen has agreed to covering the required expenses. I but pray we are ready when Mistress Rowena demands recompense.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: The weapon's nearly finished, Forename. Just needs a nice coatin' with that powder to finish the inscription.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: O' course she bloody found what we needed. As much as I hate fattenin' her purse with another man's coin, least now we can do our part fer the Resistance.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Feast yer eyes on some of me finest work to date. Best of all, the inscription'll react to yer aether.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine weapon to rally the Bozjans: [???]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: A right fine sword an' shield to rally the Bozjans: [Error] and [Error]. I reckon Gunnhildr'd be proud.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: That I should behold the glory of the fabled blades born anew... Hope is not yet lost.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: All in a day's work for yer ol' pal Gerolt. 'Course, this is only the beginning.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Your skills with a hammer were truly a sight to behold, Master Gerolt. And to see Forename wielding one of their holy blades thus, it is as if I stand before one of the heroes of eld.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: When the time comes to do battle with the Empire, our brothers-in-arms will look upon you and know courage. On behalf of the Bozjan Resistance, I offer you my humblest thanks for your aid thus far.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'd love to start fresh on another weapon, but I had to use every last morsel o' the powder on that one.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning we would find ourselves indebted further to Mistress Rowena were we to acquire more... I must consult Bajsaljen before we proceed further.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Looks like we're takin' a short break then, eh? If you find yourself wantin' for another weapon, though, come an' speak with me helper here.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I think I've earned meself a nice, big flagon of ale tonight! To, uh...celebrate the forgin', o' course!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A repeatable quest is now available from Zlatan at Gangos. This quest may be accepted to create Resistance weapons for other jobs.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Zlatan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, Thavnairian scalepowder can now be purchased from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.
